actions.text: Amendment SA 1802 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 1802 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S8025-8029; text: CR S8025) To extend the monthly special pay benefit for members of the reserve components of the Armed Forces to include time spent performing pre-deployment and re-integration duty.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1802 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Dodd.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1802 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

purpose: To extend the monthly special pay benefit for members of the reserve components of the Armed Forces to include time spent performing pre-deployment and re-integration duty.
